This classic thriller has a great premise: a sound recordist accidentally records evidence of a murder, putting him in danger. With John Travolta and Nancy Allen starring, it's a gripping film that explores the intersection of art and reality.

Or, if you're in the mood for something more light-hearted, might I suggest "Casino Royale" (1953)? This early Bond spoof is a fun take on the spy genre, featuring a charming Sir James Bond coming out of retirement to take on SMERSH. With its witty humor and lovable characters, it's a great choice if you're looking for something that will make you smile!
